<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">/// GetValueInMiddleOfBlock - Construct SSA form, materializing a value that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is live in the middle of the specified block. If ExistingValueOnly is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">/// true then this will only return an existing value or $noreg; otherwise new</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions may be inserted to materialize a value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">/// GetValueInMiddleOfBlock is the same as GetValueAtEndOfBlock except in one</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">/// important case: if there is a definition of the rewritten value after the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#39;use&#39; in BB.  Consider code like this:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">///      X1 = ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">///   SomeBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">///      use(X)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">///      X2 = ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">///      br Cond, SomeBB, OutBB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In this case, there are two values (X1 and X2) added to the AvailableVals</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">/// set by the client of the rewriter, and those values are both live out of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">/// their respective blocks.  However, the use of X happens in the &#42;middle&#42; of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a block.  Because of this, we need to insert a new PHI node in SomeBB to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">/// merge the appropriate values, and this value isn&#39;t live out of the block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinessaupdater/#a670da7741129c7d591dc19951ecce6c3"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinessaupdater/#a670da7741129c7d591dc19951ecce6c3">MachineSSAUpdater::GetValueInMiddleOfBlock</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExistingValueOnly) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there is no definition of the renamed variable in this block, just use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// GetValueAtEndOfBlock to do our work.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinessaupdater/#ac49404ed3c1f98c0889f6b164c39af60">HasValueForBlock</a>(BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GetValueAtEndOfBlockInternal(BB, ExistingValueOnly);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are no predecessors, just return undef.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a877507fda31c207ec36a018784369708">pred&#95;empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we cannot insert new instructions, just return $noreg.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExistingValueOnly)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert an implicit&#95;def to represent an undef value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;NewDef =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="#a18679ba04ac07baa9c502ce555b48859">InsertNewDef</a>(TargetOpcode::IMPLICIT&#95;DEF, BB, BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a7f0521fa2de44271fd4b909ea7351ef3">getFirstTerminator</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">                     RegAttrs, MRI, TII);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewDef-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(0).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, we have the hard case.  Get the live-in values for each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// predecessor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;std::pair&lt;MachineBasicBlock&#42;, Register&gt;</a>, 8&gt; PredValues;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SingularValue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isFirstPred = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;PredBB : BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#addd80df79ba902914c7d8a52e3896b79">predecessors</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> PredVal = GetValueAtEndOfBlockInternal(PredBB, ExistingValueOnly);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    PredValues.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(std::make&#95;pair(PredBB, PredVal));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute SingularValue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (isFirstPred) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">      SingularValue = PredVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">      isFirstPred = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PredVal != SingularValue)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      SingularValue = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, if all the merged values are the same, just use it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SingularValue)</Highlight></CodeLine>
